set.name: DMSD-17 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Evolution

property.name: Type
property.value: Star Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Jokers/Armored Dragon/RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs less than the total cost of those 2 cards. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: King Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-17 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Evolution

property.name: Race
property.value: Hero Dragon/Jokers/RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may add a creature from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, this creature gets +4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rarity

(When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)} ■ While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker": ► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-17 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Star Evolution

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all evolution creatures from among them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 13000 or less. ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
